We need permission to use location when requested

If you reject permission,you can not use this service
Please turn on permissions at [Setting] > [Permission]
GPS is not enabled. Do you want to go to settings menu?
Touch/Face ID is not attached with any user. To attach user with Touch/Face ID, you have to log in with that user. Do you want to attach any user with it?
Touch/Face ID is not configured on this device. Please configure it from the Settings.
Please check your email to reset your password.
Set your Touch/Face ID to verify your identity.
Touch/Face ID is not supported in this device!
Please select the company code(s) that you are associated with.
Please Check Your Internet Connection and Try Again
Hi Brad Pitt, It looks like you\'ve got a day off!
There is no emergency contact available.
Was the pharmacy and/or doctor contacted?
What additional information or factors contributed to the error?
Did you only report? (and not cause) the medication error?*
Did you cause the medication error?*
Showing open shifts for next 7 days
You currently have no open shifts.
Please select one or more shifts to find coverage.
You cannot select separate clients. Please deselect and try again.
You cannot find coverage for more than one non-consecutive shift at a time. Please deselect and try again.
Please select one or more employees to send an SOS message.
Do you want to add a comment?
You have entered the start and end time of the entire shift. Do you wish to continue?
Selected start date time can\'t be earlier than shift start date time.
Selected end date time can\'t be later than shift end date time.
Which part of this shift can you fill?
Please select an employee to fill the shift.
You cannot select more than one employee to fill this shift.
You must select an employee that has accepted to fill all or part of the open shift.
This shift has been partially filled.
You are clocking in Early for this shift. Would you like to continue to Clock In Early?
You are clocking in Early for this shift. Would you like to continue to Clock In Early for this Shift or Clock In On Time for this Shift?
You are clocking in Late for this shift. An email is being sent to your supervisor. Please give a reason for clocking in late.
You are clocking out Late for this shift. Would you like to continue to Clock Out Late?
You are clocking out Late for this shift. Would you like to continue to Clock Out Late or Clock Out On Time for this Shift?
You are clocking out Early for this shift. An email is being sent to your supervisor. Please give a reason for clocking out early.
You have successfully clocked in for this shift. Thank you!
You have successfully clocked out for this shift. Thank you!
One or more of your answers were not valid, therefore you are not allowed to Clock In/Out for this shift.
One or more of your responses cannot be validated. Would you like to continue?
Please respond to all the questions in the form
You must select shift(s) before you can continue.
You cannot select shifts of different clients together.
You must either have only one linked shift selected, or have all consecutive linked shifts selected with the same combination of linked clients.
The sum total of all selected shifts is more than the allowable limit. Please try again
When selecting multiple shifts they must be consecutive and with the same client
This shift was created using QSClock. The reason given is:
Please give a reason for creating this shift.
You have successfully added and clocked in for this shift. An email is being sent to your supervisor. Thank you!
Please give a reason for replacing the scheduled staff.
A picture is required to be taken during clock in.
The approved location cannot be found. Please check the address and contact your supervisor.
You cannot clock in/out because you are not within the allowable limits of the approved location.
You are not within the allowable limits of the approved location. Do you want to continue?
End time can\'t be earlier than the start time.
You need a staff member assigned with a Training or ILS Admin shift type.
Please enter a valid Start Time.
Please enter a valid End Time.
You have already clocked in for this shift.
It is passed the time to be able to Clock In for this shift. Please contact your supervisor.
This shift date is not matched with today\'s date. Please contact to supervisor.
You have already clocked out for this shift.
You cannot clock out at a time that is before the shift start time.
It is passed the time to be able to Clock Out for this shift. Please contact your supervisor.
When is your expected date and time to clock out?
Which approved location are you clocking in/out at?
Please choose an Approved Location from the list to proceed
Failed to check for existing shift
Which part of this shift can you fill?
You cannot clock out until a Daily Service Note is completed for this shift
A problem occurred with this shift. Please contact your supervisor.
There is some problem with this shift. Please contact to supervisor.
Please enter a valid End Time.
Please enter a valid End Date.
You are clocking in Late for this shift. An email is being sent to your supervisor. Please give a reason for clocking in late and replacing the scheduled staff.
Hi %1$s, it looks like you\'ve got a day off!
Please give a reason for clocking in early.
Please give a reason for clocking in late.
Please give a reason for clocking out early.
Please give a reason for clocking out late.
Please give a reason for clocking in early and replacing the scheduled staff.
Please give a reason for clocking in early.
Please give a reason for clocking in late.
You cannot clock in early for this shift. Please contact your supervisor.
You cannot clock out early for this shift. Please contact your supervisor.
Do you want to view image or re-upload?
How long have you worked at your agency?*
How long have you served this client?
Do you want to resend the form data?
Please select at least 1 sub-component from
Please select at least 1 outcome from
The new shift has been successfully linked to the completed Daily Service Note record
Choose the Daily Service Note to link this shift to:
A Daily Service Note has not yet been created for this shift. To create a new Daily Service Note go to \"My Daily Service Notes\"
This Daily Service Note cannot be viewed because it has not yet been completed by the assigned employee
Do you want to link this shift to a completed Daily Service Note?
Signatures require all Forms to have been completed
There is at least one missing signature. Please add prior to saving
Summary details are required prior to saving
Summary details and completed signatures are required prior to saving
Summary details cannot be added until all Forms have been completed
Daily Service Notes Form not found.
You cannot create a Daily Service Note until you have clocked in to the starting shift.
The pay period containing this schedule date has been finalized and no changes can be made. Pay period must first be re-opened to make any adjustments.
Sleep Hours can\'t be more than the Total Shift Hours.
Sleep Hours must be 0 or a number between 5 and 8.
Clock In Time must be before the shift\'s End Time
Clock Out Time must be after the shift\'s Start Time
A shift with this Service Type must include at least 1 Subcode. Please add a Subcode or change the Service Type.
Please enter valid time.\n Format like 1.30
Would you like to Delete this shift completely or mark the shift as Cancelled?
This shift has a signed service record associated with it and can\'t be deleted or canceled. To delete or cancel this shift, reset the service record from the Service Record Dashboard.
This shift cannot be deleted or canceled because it is part of a Daily Service Note record. To delete/cancel this shift, the Daily Service Note record must first be deleted from the client’s profile.
Please enter Notes for the Change Reason
Would you like to clock in now or another specific time?
Enter a time and click \'OK\' or click \'Original End Time\'
Would you like to clock out now or another specific time?
The total time spent on Objectives doesn\'t match the total time on the shift. Please adjust the Objective times to match the shift time.
The total time spent on Subcodes doesn\'t match the total time on the shift. Please adjust the Subcodes times to match the shift time.
You need a staff member assigned with a Training shift type.
Would you like to validate this shift?
You are attempting to modify a schedule that has already been Approved by the supervisor. Would you like to continue?
The total time spent on Objectives doesn\'t match the total time on the shift. Please adjust the times to match the shift time.
Would you like to delete this shift objective?
Would you like to delete this shift subcode?
Enter a time and click \'OK\' or click \'Original Start Time\'
Are you sure you want to remove user from Touch/Face ID configuration?

Your Touch/Face ID has been successfully attached to this logged in User. Next time you can use your Touch/Face ID to login with this user.

Touch ID is not configured for any user yet.
No handler for this type of file.
Please enter a valid Email address.
Passwords must be at least 6 characters and contain at least 1 number.
New password and confirm password should be same.
Please acknowledge at least one medication.
Please select injection site for %s medication.
You cannot acknowledge %s now per its PRN interval.
You cannot select linked and unlinked shifts together.
You must either have only one shift selected, or have all consecutive shifts selected.
We found additional consecutive shifts with selected date. Do you want to include them as well in list of service records?
You don\'t have permission to add client service record photo.
You must provide either client or employee\'s signature.
You cannot yet validate this timesheet period because there are scheduled shifts still to be worked.
Please write comments about requested review.

I attest that all hours I worked during the pay period recorded are the actual hours I worked on each day, including all overtime hours worked. Unless otherwise recorded, I attest that I have received all my meal, rest and recovery periods consistent with my agency’s policy and applicable law. I also attest that I reported every injury sustained on the job during the pay period, if there were any.
Would you like to save and store this signature for future use? If not, you can save your signature later in your Employee Settings.
Are you sure want to delete?
You don\'t have permission to view IHSS tracking.
You don\'t have permission to view POS tracking.
End of Life Paperwork on File?
Emergency Contact for two family/community supports
Only "Fire", "Flood" and "Earthquake" (and "COVID-19" if applicable) types will display on the printed EAP report.
What did you do? (include hospital, address, and doctor info, if applicable. If another agency was involved, include name of person and agency)*
What would you suggest you and your agency do differently next time?
Person you spoke to at your agency
Name of next employee alerted to needs/events for follow up

In regards to staffing, does the client have any comments, issues or additional needs?
Are staff accommodations sufficient, or are additional supplies needed? (Ex: sleeping arrangements such as mattresses, furniture, universal precaution supplies, etc)
Describe the fiduciary process in the home
Fiduciary process in the home is:
Describe any budgeting/bill paying issues that exist
Is the fire extinguisher present and up to date?

How can your team partner with the client for continued success?
Please describe the overall feel and tone of the meeting
Describe the overall appearance of the home and food supply
Describe any changes needed to ISP

By State Order, all staff are required to have the COVID-19 vaccine in order to continue employment, or you may choose a medical or religious exemption. Please complete the form to let us know what you will choose.
Remind me next time I log in
Are you currently fully vaccinated for COVID-19?
Do you want to upload proof of your vaccination now or later?
Okay, you will be reminded again later to complete this form. But, you can restart it any time by selecting this icon in the top left hand corner of your home screen.
Select the dates the 1st and 2nd dose of the vaccine were administered?
Select the date the dose of the Johnson and Johnson vaccine was administered?
Please upload supporting documentation of proof of vaccination.
You must upload supporting documentation before continuing
Do you plan on getting the COVID-19 vaccine or do you have a medical or religious exemption?
Do you want to upload proof of your exemption now or later?
Please upload supporting documentation of proof of medical exemption
Please upload supporting documentation of proof of religious exemption
Are you currently fully vaccinated for COVID-19?
Respond to each item and then sign and submit.
Dose 2 date should be greater than dose 1 date.
